text: Hagi Gati nagapintira hankave sondia vahetmima ha'ma hu'zama antahi ani hu'neza hankoma eri'neza kevema ahe'are'ma vugota hu'nazankino ha'ma nehazageno'a, zamugosamo'a laioni avugosagna nehige'za, zamagamare'amo'a agonafi nemaniza dia afukna hu'za zamaga neraza vaheki'za Solina atre'za ka'ma kopima hankavenentake vihu'afima Deviti'ma mani'nerega vu'za agrane umani'naze.
